name: Chicken life (Kip)
description:
Click on chickens to see their thirst, hunger, egg laying progress and name.

Use A / D or LEFT / RIGHT to move the camera.

Press ESCAPE to open the pause menu.

Click the green bar at the top to change game speed and see some basic statistics.

Chickens will grow up and then lay eggs over time.

Chickens will die if they are completely dehydrated or starving.

Known issues:

-Progress is not saved

-Possible UI scaling problems

Report any other bugs to me!

The game is quite slow so if you want you can leave it running in the background to see what happens ;)
